attributes.action: allow co-habitees rights to inherit when long partner dies intestate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present long term partners have to apply through the courts for financial assistant from a late partners estate should that partner die intestate. This is very costly and can have serious implications especially where there are minor children involved. Surviving partners should be able to inherit in order to continue to spport families.
